import { Realtyobject } from './../../models/realtyobject'; import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-realtyobject', templateUrl: './realtyobject.component.html', styleUrls: ['./realtyobject.component.scss'] }) export class RealtyobjectComponent { @Input() realtyobject: Realtyobject }
